comments.body: Should we add a TBD to investigate options to remove this dependency in the future?
It's a minor issue and easy to find and correct at a later time if we come across a fix. I don't think it's worth burning cycles over.

comments.body: Not sure I understand why were are removing properties that are in a default state from the have list.  If the want list needs to put these properties into a non-default state don't we need to include them?  I am probably missing something obvious so it's really just a question.
@chrisvanheuveln and I chatted and I understand now.
